content: After serving in the military, I learned that discipline and attention to detail aren't just habitsâ€”they're a way of life. When I returned home to Indian River County, I saw a need for a pool service company that operated with those same values.

I started Firewater Pools with a simple mission: to treat every pool as if it were my own and every customer with the respect they deserve. No shortcuts, no missed visits, just honest work done right.
When you hire Firewater Pools, you're not just getting a pool guy; you're getting a dedicated professional who takes pride in keeping your backyard oasis safe and beautiful for your family.

values.intro: The principles that guide our work every single day.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We do what we say we're going to do. If we make a mistake, we own it and fix it.

items.title: Discipline
items.description: We show up on time, in uniform, and follow a strict checklist for every service.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: Good enough isn't good enough. We strive for crystal clear water and perfectly running equipment.

items.title: Service
items.description: Serving our community with the same dedication I brought to my military service.

items.quote: Kevin runs his business like a tight ship. Always on time, respectful, and my pool has never looked better.
